Name: MPI_THREAD_FUNNELED
Description: MPI_THREAD_FUNNELED represents a thread support level. It is used as part of the MPI_Init_thread initialisation. MPI_THREAD_FUNNELED is the second level; it informs MPI that the application is multithreaded, however all MPI calls will be issued from the master thread only. Other thread support levels are, in order, MPI_THREAD_SINGLE, MPI_THREAD_SERIALIZED and MPI_THREAD_MULTIPLE.
